paddyhoran commented on a change in pull request #2513: ARROW-3172: [Rust] Update documentation for datatypes.rs
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2513#discussion_r215336329
 
 

 ##########
 File path: rust/src/datatypes.rs
 ##########
 @@ -15,14 +15,32 @@
 // specific language governing permissions and limitations
 // under the License.
 
+/*!
 
 Review comment:
   I believe that surrounding with `/*!` and `*/` is equivalent to starting each line with `//!`.  I'm finding it hard to confirm this but I noticed this approach [here](https://github.com/BurntSushi/rust-csv/blob/master/src/lib.rs)
   
   I guess we should stick with `//!` as it seems to be most used approach.

----------------------------------------------------------------

paddyhoran commented on issue #2513: ARROW-3172: [Rust] Update documentation for datatypes.rs
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2513#issuecomment-418931722
 
 
   @kszucs @andygrove I'm not sure why the windows build failed.  The previous commit only failed the non-windows build because thats where we run the `fmt` tool.
   
   I just ran everything locally on windows and it's all good, I think Appveyor just timed out or something.  I think this should be good to merge (not sure how to re-trigger CI without making changes to confirm my theory), what do you think?

----------------------------------------------------------------
